name: slurm-connect
description: Connect VS Code to Slurm allocations.

slurmConnect.loginHosts.description: Login hosts available for connection. Used when loginHostsCommand is empty.

slurmConnect.loginHostsCommand.description: Remote command that outputs login hosts (newline or whitespace separated). If set, it is executed over SSH to discover login nodes.

slurmConnect.loginHostsQueryHost.description: Host used to run loginHostsCommand. Defaults to the first login host or the selected login host.

slurmConnect.partitionCommand.description: Remote command that outputs partition names.

slurmConnect.partitionInfoCommand.description: Remote command that outputs partition info in the format name|node|cpus|memMB|gres.

slurmConnect.filterFreeResources.description: Filter cluster info suggestions to currently free resources.

slurmConnect.qosCommand.description: Optional remote command that outputs QoS names.

slurmConnect.accountCommand.description: Optional remote command that outputs account names.

slurmConnect.user.description: SSH username. Leave blank to use the local OS username.

slurmConnect.identityFile.description: Optional SSH identity file to include in generated host entries and used for resource queries.

slurmConnect.preSshCommand.description: Optional local command to run before SSH queries and Remote-SSH connections (e.g. step ssh login ...).

slurmConnect.preSshCheckCommand.description: Optional local command used to determine whether pre-SSH authentication is still valid (exit 0 = skip pre-SSH command).

slurmConnect.autoInstallProxyScriptOnClu.description: Auto-install/update the bundled proxy script on the login host when connecting.

slurmConnect.forwardAgent.description: Whether to set ForwardAgent yes in generated host entries.

slurmConnect.requestTTY.description: Whether to set RequestTTY yes in generated host entries.

slurmConnect.moduleLoad.description: Optional module load command prepended to the RemoteCommand.

slurmConnect.proxyCommand.description: Advanced: Command that launches the Slurm proxy script on the remote host (not shown in the UI).

slurmConnect.proxyArgs.description: Extra arguments appended to the proxy command.

slurmConnect.extraSallocArgs.description: Extra salloc arguments appended to every request (e.g. --gres=gpu:1).

slurmConnect.promptForExtraSallocArgs.description: Prompt for additional salloc arguments each time you connect.

slurmConnect.sessionMode.description: Allocation mode. Persistent reuses a Slurm allocation across reconnects.

slurmConnect.sessionKey.description: Optional key to identify a persistent session. Leave blank to reuse the SSH alias.

slurmConnect.sessionIdleTimeoutSeconds.description: Idle timeout in seconds before cancelling a persistent allocation. Set to 0 to disable.

slurmConnect.sessionStateDir.description: Optional directory for persistent session state (markers/job info). Leave blank to use the proxy default.

slurmConnect.defaultTime.description: Default wall time in HH:MM:SS or D-HH:MM:SS format.

slurmConnect.defaultMemoryMb.description: Default memory per node in MB. Set to 0 to leave unset.

slurmConnect.defaultGpuType.description: Default GPU type (e.g. A100). Leave blank for any type.

slurmConnect.defaultGpuCount.description: Default GPU count. Set to 0 to leave unset.

slurmConnect.sshHostPrefix.description: Prefix for generated SSH host aliases.

slurmConnect.openInNewWindow.description: Open the Remote-SSH connection in a new window.

slurmConnect.remoteWorkspacePath.description: Remote folder to open after connecting (e.g. /home/user/project). Leave blank to just connect.

slurmConnect.temporarySshConfigPath.description: Path for the Slurm Connect SSH include file. The extension installs a small Include block (with a note) in your SSH config that points here.

slurmConnect.additionalSshOptions.description: Additional SSH config options to include in generated host entries.

slurmConnect.sshQueryConfigPath.description: Optional SSH config path to use when querying the cluster.

slurmConnect.sshConnectTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout for SSH resource queries in seconds.
